name: Compress sentences
description:
This kata is a very basic introduction to compression.

Your task is to make a program which **takes in a sentence** and returns a string which shows the **unique position** of each word in the sentence. If a word appears more than once in the sentence, your string should
return the position of the **first occurrence** of the word.

Unique position in this case means the position of the word **excluding repeated words**.
Capitalisation of words should be accounted for:
'BEE' should be considered the same as 'bee'. The sentences include no punctuation.


Example
-----
`"man hello man"`

becomes

`"010"`

Example
-----

`"THE ONE BUMBLE BEE one bumble the bee"`

becomes

`"01231203"`

Example
-----

`"Ask not what your COUNTRY can do for you ASK WHAT YOU CAN DO FOR YOUR country"`

becomes

`"01234567802856734"`
